   19: %%
   20: -module(beam_ssa_check_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: %% Runs tests checking the structure of BEAM SSA code.
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("stdlib/include/erl_compile.hrl").
   26: 
   27: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0,
   28:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   29: 	 init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   30: 
   31:          alias_checks/1,
   32:          annotation_checks/1,
   33:          appendable_checks/1,
   34:          bs_size_unit_checks/1,
   35:          private_append_checks/1,
   36:          ret_annotation_checks/1,
   37:          sanity_checks/1,
   38:          tuple_inplace_checks/1]).
   39: 
   40: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   41: 
   42: all() ->
   43:     [{group,post_ssa_opt_dynamic},{group,post_ssa_opt_static}].
   44: 
   45: groups() ->
   46:     [{post_ssa_opt_static,test_lib:parallel(),
   47:       [alias_checks,
   48:        annotation_checks,
   49:        appendable_checks,
   50:        private_append_checks,
   51:        ret_annotation_checks,
   52:        sanity_checks,
   53:        tuple_inplace_checks]},
   54:      {post_ssa_opt_dynamic,test_lib:parallel(),
   55:       [bs_size_unit_checks]}].
   56: 
   57: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   58:     test_lib:recompile(?MODULE),
   59:     Config.
   60: 
   61: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   62:     ok.
   63: 
   64: init_per_group(post_ssa_opt_dynamic, Config) ->
   65:     TargetDir = dynamic_workdir(Config),
   66:     ct:log("Creating working directory for generated test cases: ~p~n",
   67:            [TargetDir]),
   68:     ok = file:make_dir(TargetDir),
   69:     Config;
   70: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   71:     Config.
   72: 
   73: end_per_group(post_ssa_opt_dynamic, Config) ->
   74:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
   75:     TargetDir = filename:join(PrivDir, "dynamic"),
   76:     case proplists:get_bool(keep_generated, Config) of
   77:         false ->
   78:             ct:log("Removing working directory for generated test cases: ~p~n",
   79:                    [TargetDir]),
   80:             file:del_dir_r(TargetDir);
   81:         true ->
   82:             Config
   83:     end;
   84: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   85:     Config.
   86: 
   87: alias_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   88:     run_post_ssa_opt(alias, Config),
   89:     run_post_ssa_opt(alias_non_convergence, Config),
   90:     run_post_ssa_opt(alias_chain, Config).
   91: 
   92: annotation_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   93:     run_post_ssa_opt(annotations, Config).
   94: 
   95: appendable_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   96:     run_post_ssa_opt(appendable, Config).
   97: 
   98: bs_size_unit_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   99:     gen_and_run_post_ssa_opt(bs_size_unit_checks, Config).
  100: 
  101: private_append_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  102:     run_post_ssa_opt(private_append, Config).
  103: 
  104: tuple_inplace_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  105:     run_post_ssa_opt(tuple_inplace_checks, Config).
  106: 
  107: ret_annotation_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  108:     run_post_ssa_opt(ret_annotation, Config).
  109: 
  110: sanity_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  111:     run_post_ssa_opt(sanity_checks, Config).
  112: 
  113: dynamic_workdir(Config) ->
  114:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  115:     filename:join(PrivDir, "dynamic").
  116: 
  117: run_post_ssa_opt(Module, Config) ->
  118:     File = atom_to_list(Module) ++ ".erl",
  119: 
  120:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  121:     Source = filename:join(DataDir, File),
  122:     run_checks(Source, post_ssa_opt, Config).
  123: 
  124: run_checks(SourceFile, Pass, _Config) ->
  125:     Flags = [binary, deterministic, {check_ssa,Pass}, report_errors],
  126:     case compile:file(SourceFile, Flags) of
  127:         {ok,_,_} -> ok;
  128:         error -> ct:fail({unexpected_error, "SSA check failed"})
  129:     end.
  130: 
  131: gen_and_run_post_ssa_opt(Base, Config) ->
  132:     BaseStr = atom_to_list(Base),
  133:     GenFilenameBase = "gen_" ++ BaseStr,
  134:     GenModule = list_to_atom(GenFilenameBase),
  135:     GenFilename = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  136:                                 GenFilenameBase ++ ".erl"),
  137:     ct:log("Compiling generator ~s~n", [GenFilename]),
  138:     {ok,GenModule,GenCode} = compile:file(GenFilename, [binary]),
  139:     {module,GenModule} = code:load_binary(GenModule, GenFilename, GenCode),
  140:     TargetFileName = filename:join(dynamic_workdir(Config), BaseStr ++ ".erl"),
  141:     ct:log("Generating ~s~n", [TargetFileName]),
  142:     ok = GenModule:generate(TargetFileName, Config),
  143:     run_checks(TargetFileName, post_ssa_opt, Config).
